Uses of Interface
javax.json.JsonPatchBuilder

  • Packages that use JsonPatchBuilder 
    Package Description
    javax.json
    Provides an object model API to process JSON.
    javax.json.spi
    Service Provider Interface (SPI) to plug in implementations for JSON processing objects.

    • Uses of JsonPatchBuilder in javax.json

      Adds an "add" JSON Patch operation.
      JsonPatchBuilder JsonPatchBuilder.copy​(String path, String from)
      Adds a "copy" JSON Patch operation.
      static JsonPatchBuilder Json.createPatchBuilder​()
      Creates a JSON Patch builder (RFC 6902).
      static JsonPatchBuilder Json.createPatchBuilder​(JsonArray array)
      Creates a JSON Patch builder (RFC 6902), initialized with the specified operations.

      Adds a "move" JSON Patch operation.
